meanings.definition: A type of decorative metalwork, typically gilded bronze.
meanings.sent1: The ormolu on the clock gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She admired the ormolu candlesticks on the mantelpiece.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the ormolu vase, thinking it was a shiny toy.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright as ormolu, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The ormolu details on the mirror added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: An object made of or decorated with ormolu.
meanings.sent1: The antique table was adorned with intricate ormolu designs.
meanings.sent2: The ormolu figurine stood out among the other decorations.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to the ormolu clock as her 'golden timekeeper'.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinkled like delicate ormolu chimes.
meanings.sent5: The ormolu frame highlighted the beauty of the painting within.
